segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl is eager to get her hands on some cookies too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, waiting for the boy to pass her some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying dishes like nothing else is going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out onto the floor, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden outside through the window, it looks so nice and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's strange how the outside is so peaceful while the inside is so chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them about the stool tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But maybe I should just watch and see what happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
